pageTitle: Statement by the Prime Minister on the results of the provincial election in Manitoba | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
The Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, today issued the following statement on the results of the provincial election in Manitoba:

“Manitobans have chosen to re-elect a majority government led by the Progressive Conservative Party of Manitoba.  

“On behalf of the Government of Canada, I offer my sincere congratulations to Brian Pallister on his re-election as Premier.”
